titleInfo.title: WAS brought to the City Police Jail.

mods.abstract: WAS brought to the City Police Jail on the 29th of September, the black boy JOHNSays he belongs to MrRobert Boyd, who lives in the Parish of Point CoupeeHe is five feet four inches high, and has a scar above the left eyeThe owner will call and claim his property according to lawEPLANCHARD, Keeper of City Police JailRegistered October 4, 1858T.JHITSELBERGER, Deputy Comptrolleroc5 15t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
